comment.author: 7520518@N03
comment._content: This is my Nanna's family, the Sullivans. The father, (my Great Grandad) is Joseph Sullivan, he was the Drouin Station Master. Her was married to Vanice, their daughters (from left to right) are Marge, Peg, Kathleen (my nanna) and Joan (half cut off on the right) and their son is called Kevin.

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/deborahlrowe] Hi Deborah.L, thank you for letting us know this picture is your family. We have updated the title in Flickr, and in our catalogue record: nla.gov.au/nla.cat-vn654389
